com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.adaptive.vitter

Class ProceduralVitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.adaptive.vitter.ProceduralVitter

  • public class ProceduralVitter
extends Object
    The original Pascal code of Vitter's paper, directly translated in Java, without object paradigm adaptation.

    Here is a quick list of the main notations from the paper:

    n
    alphabet size
    aj
    jth letter in the alphabet. Here we'll directly use the char aj instead of the int j itself.
    t
    number of letters in the message processed so far
    k
    number of distinct letters processed so far

    In the paper, arrays are indexed starting at 1. 0 is used to denote null. It is reproduced here, the index 0 kept unused.

    Author:
    Joffrey Bion
